title_page: Newton sheriff: Man found in underwear was kidnapped, robbed...
text:
A man was kidnapped in DeKalb County on Monday morning, then robbed, shot and dumped on a road in southern Newton County, authorities said.
A driver spotted the man around 9:50 a.m. walking near Ga. 162 and Ga. 36, the Newton County Sheriff’s Office posted on its Facebook page. The man, described as being in his early 30s, was wearing a bloody undershirt and boxers when found. Authorities did not release the man’s name.
The motorist called 911 and the man was taken to the hospital for emergency surgery.
The sheriff’s office is asking that anyone with information on the case anonymously contact the Crime Stoppers Atlanta tip line at 404-577-TIPS (8477), online www.crimestoppersatlanta.org, or by texting CSA and the tip to CRIMES (274637).
